description: Present head of the noble Farnese family. She is also an old friend of Conrad`s and one of the few outside her party to know Juliet`s secret. She offers her home in Mantua as a sanctuary for Juliet, Curio, Francisco, and Antonio after Juliet is rescued from Montague, where they are attended by Ariel`s butler, Balthazar, and his granddaughter, Regan.
name: Ariel
